data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea abies (Norway spruce) from sample RONCAN-31

Exposition SW, Slope 20 deg, Geology: Gneisschutt, Tree line 1400 m, av. Tree height 30 m, Tree cover 80%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 90%, Vegatation type: Adenostylo alliariae-Piceetum subalpinum, Film number: 661A
